text:
Sri Venkateswara Group of Institutions will organise a job fair with more than 200 openings in HR, Sales, Marketing, Finance, and IT on February 21 at 9 a.m. The job fair is open for both UG and PG students.

For registration, contact- 90470 50502/ 99449 19444 and a confirmation email toinfo@srivenkateswara.inRegarding companies contact- 98433 50272/ 97866 50176.
title: TAMIL NADU
